data.name: Classic
data.description: The only card back you'll ever need.

data.name: Pandaria
data.description: Hearthstone is a very popular game in Pandaria.  Official card game of the Shado-Pan!
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, April 2014.

data.name: Black Temple
data.description: "Fel Flame Green" is always in fashion at the Black Temple.
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, May 2014.

data.name: Rainbow!
data.description: Unfortunately, the rainbow generator can only produce oval rainbows.  Gnomish technology still has a ways to go.
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, June 2014.

data.name: Fireside
data.description: A generous gift from the Innkeeper.  He loves to see his guests having a good time together.
data.howToGet: Play three matches against players at a Fireside Gathering.

data.name: Legend
data.description: Wow.  Hardcore.
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Legend Rank in Ranked Play.

data.name: Naxxramas
data.description: The gooey center is Ooze slime.  Don't lick it.
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, July 2014.

data.name: Heroic Naxxramas
data.description: You can tell a lot about an Abomination by his stitching.  This one just screams "insane".  Literally.
data.howToGet: Acquired from completing the Curse of Naxxramas in Heroic mode.

data.name: Icecrown
data.description: In the frozen heart of Icecrown Citadel, a hero's mettle will be tested.  Bring a parka.
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, August 2014.

data.name: Pirates!
data.description: Treasure.  Grog.  Hooks for hands.  Way better than Ninjas!
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, September 2014.

data.name: Hallow's End
data.description: The Hallow's End candy bucket!  Or the Headless Horseman's spare head!  Stick your hand in and find out.
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, October 2014.

data.name: Goblins
data.description: 4 out of 5 goblins agree: This card back doesn't explode!
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, November 2014.

data.name: Blizzard 2014
data.description: The year Hearthstone was born.  What a great year!
data.howToGet: Acquired by participating in Blizzard events during 2014.

data.name: Dalaran Flame
data.description: Mascot of Dalaran University.  Rarely seen, because no one ever shows up to football games there.
data.howToGet: Acquired by participating in TeSPA or other college affiliate program.

data.name: Warlords
data.description: When they aren't plotting to kill everyone and take over the world, even the Iron Horde enjoy a game of Hearthstone.
data.howToGet: Acquired from Warlords of Draenor Digital Deluxe Edition.

data.name: Gnomes
data.description: This multifunctional device also works as a gnomish army knife, a shoe horn and a pass to the Deeprun Tram.  Gnomish ingenuity!
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, December 2014.

data.name: Maraad
data.description: Vindicator Maraad was a paladin of great courage and strength.  Don't let the pretty pastel tones fool you.
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, January 2015.

data.name: Lunar New Year
data.description: Happy New Year!
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, February 2015.

data.name: Molten Core
data.description: The Molten Core of Azeroth and not a chocolate lava cake, unfortunately.
data.howToGet: Was acquired from pre-purchase of Blackrock Mountain.

data.name: Ragnaros
data.description: The Firelord is most often seen relaxing in his hot tub, even when he's trying to burn down the world.
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, March 2015.

data.name: Golden Celebration
data.description: Solid gold, baby.
data.howToGet: Acquired with a high level finish in approved eSports events.

data.name: Nefarian
data.description: You didn't actually believe someone named "Lord Victor Nefarious" wasn't up to anything nefarious, did you?
data.howToGet: Acquired from completing Blackrock Mountain in Heroic mode.

data.name: Cupcake
data.description: "Is that a cupcake on a cake?"" you ask?  Yes.  Yes it is.
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, April 2015.

data.name: Ninjas!
data.description: Stealth.  Style.  Shurikens.  Way better than Pirates!
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, May 2015.

data.name: Heroes of the Storm
data.description: This arrived for you from the Nexus.  Might want to watch out for those whirling blade thingies.
data.howToGet: Acquired from reaching Player Level 15 in the Blizzard game Heroes of the Storm.

data.name: Alleria
data.description: When she wants to shoot an apple on your head, you don't have to worry.  Unless you're an orc.
data.howToGet: Acquired from purchasing the Hero Alleria Windrunner.

data.name: Magni
data.description: As the eldest of the three Bronzebeard brothers, Magni always got the coolest toys.  He always shared, though!
data.howToGet: Acquired from purchasing the Hero Magni Bronzebeard.

data.name: Medivh
data.description: He certainly has a thing for crows and ravens.
data.howToGet: Acquired from purchasing the Hero Medivh.

data.name: Darnassus
data.description: Nestled in the boughs of a giant tree, Darnassus is the capital city of the night elves.  Also home of the world famous Darnassus Kimchi Pie!
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, June 2015.

data.name: Samsung Galaxy
data.description: Gifts from the Galaxy!  This card back is truly out of this world.
data.howToGet: Awarded through the Samsung Galaxy promotion!

data.name: Darkspear
data.description: Vol'jin's tribe, the Darkspear trolls, no longer practices cannibalism. Officially.
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, July 2015.

data.name: The Grand Tournament
data.description: After the fall of the Lich King, it was suggested that we celebrate then go home.  Those of us who stayed decided to continue the Tournament with a new mission:  FUN!
data.howToGet: Was acquired from pre-purchase of The Grand Tournament Card Packs.

data.name: Tournament Grounds
data.description: All over The Grand Tournament's grounds, you can find knights at jousting practice. Poor target dummies. So much senseless hay shed on the path to glory...
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, August 2015.

data.name: Power Core
data.description: We can feel the energy in the air. And it's coming from... YOU!
data.howToGet: Acquired from attending approved eSports events.

data.name: Exodar
data.description: The capital city of the draenei is actually a crash-landed dimensional ship.  Despite its wonders and Velen's best efforts, its tourism industry is sluggish due to its remote location (and the man-eating mutant plants).
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, September 2015.

data.name: Highmaul
data.description: 5 out of 10 ogres agree: this card back is SMASHING!
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, October 2015.

data.name: Explorer's Map
data.description: A League of Explorers treasure map!  Or the Cartographer's grocery list?  Let's find out!
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, November 2015.

data.name: Staff of Origination
data.description: Wait, isn't this staff supposed to be in the museum?  RENO!!!
data.howToGet: Acquired from completing the League of Explorers in Heroic mode.

data.name: Blizzard 2015
data.description: Hearthstone on phones, Tavern Brawls, Blackrock Mountain, The Grand Tournament and more! A very cool year, indeed.
data.howToGet: Acquired by participating in Blizzard events during 2015.

data.name: Legacy of the Void
data.description: Came with a note.  What on Azeroth does "En Taro Adun" mean?
data.howToGet: Acquired from Legacy of the Void Deluxe Edition.

data.name: Love Is in the Air
data.description: Many believe goblins made up this holiday to sell candy.  It's not true!  They also sell flowers and perfume!
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, January 2016.

data.name: Thunder Bluff
data.description: Unofficial slogan:  "Great warriors come from happy Tauren tribes.  Happy Tauren come from Thunder Bluff!"
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, February 2016.

data.name: Thrall
data.description: The World Shaman is probably THE best known celebrity in Azeroth.  It's a mystery that his signature necklace never caught on as a fashion trend.
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, December 2015.

data.name: Winter Veil Wreath
data.description: A beautiful Winter Veil wreath around a snow globe full of THE FROSTY DESTRUCTION OF YOUR OPPONENTS!  I mean...  good cheer.
data.howToGet: Acquired from the Gift Exchange Tavern Brawl.

data.name: Overwatch
data.description: The cavalry's here!
data.howToGet: Acquired from Overwatch Origins or Collector's Edition.

data.name: Eyes of C'Thun
data.description: For an Old God who's stuck in the lightless depths of an ancient temple, C'Thun sure has a lot of eyeballs.
data.howToGet: Was acquired from pre-purchase of the Whispers of the Old Gods Card Packs.

data.name: Hogger
data.description: The Terror of Elwynn, the King of Gnolls. They say he bathes in the tears of young heroes, hence the wet dog smell.
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, March 2016.

data.name: Clutch of Yogg-Saron
data.description: There are several cults trying to summon the Old God Yogg-Saron, and the competition for cultists is causing salaries to skyrocket.
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, April 2016.

data.name: Shadowmoon Valley
data.description: After Outland became what it is, Shadowmoon Valley has always been full of demonic energy. Gul'dan's favorite spa destination!
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, May 2016.

data.name: Zul'Drak
data.description: Home of the Drakkari ice trolls, Zul'Drak consistently produces the best figure skaters of all the troll tribes.
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, June 2016.

data.name: Halfhill
data.description: Surrounded by fertile farmland that grows delectable giant produce, Halfhill is the culinary heart of Pandaria. "Come to Halfhill! Double your weight!"
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, November 2016.

data.name: The Blue Portal
data.description: Don't tell Netherspite, but mischievous guests have been getting into all manner of shenanigans with his portals!
data.howToGet: Acquired from completing One Night in Karazhan in Heroic mode.

data.name: Tinyfin Beach
data.description: Be sure to pack your picnic basket, towel, and Anti-Murloc Spray.
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, July 2016.

data.name: Karazhan Nights
data.description: Watch your step! Dancing Tauren are notorious for accidentally crushing toes.
data.howToGet: Acquired by purchasing all wings of One Night in Karazhan within one week of launch.

data.name: Medivh's Invitation
data.description: You're Invited! Please leave your giant bear with the valet.
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, August, 2016.

data.name: Tyrande
data.description: Every Midsummer's Eve, night elf children gather in the Temple of the Moon for Tyrande's amazing planetarium show, "By the Light of Elune."
data.howToGet: Acquired from a special promotion.

data.name: Legion
data.description: The Burning Legion attempted to invade Azeroth three times in the last 10,000 years. Fourth time's the charm?
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, September 2016.

data.name: Pie
data.description: Pilgrim's Bounty feasters await the arrival of delicious cherry pie. The bakers have only one request: Please eat a piece before the FOOD FIGHT begins!
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, October 2016.

data.name: Welcome Inn
data.description: Pull up a chair by the fireside at BlizzCon's Hearthstone Tavern, then play a few hands with this year's convention-innspired card back.
data.howToGet: Acquired by participating in Blizzard events during 2016.

data.name: Secret Level
data.description: Moo.  That's right.  You heard me.
data.howToGet: Acquired from The Dark Wanderer Tavern Brawl, 2017.

data.name: Jade Lotus
data.description: The Jade Lotus is the newest of the three groups vying for Gadgetzan. They're hip with today's criminal youth.
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, December 2016.

data.name: Grimy Goons
data.description: The Grimy Goons once kicked a guy out for tucking a Ragnaros up his sleeve.
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, January 2017.

data.name: Kabal
data.description: The Kabal are notorious for potions, treachery, and accidentally blowing themselves up with 10-mana spells.
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, February 2017.

data.name: Year of the Kraken
data.description: RELEASE THE CARDBACK!
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, March 2017.

data.name: Fossil
data.description: Recent discoveries from the tar pits of Un'Goro have shed great insight on the evolution of card backs!
data.howToGet: Was acquired from pre-purchase of Journey to Un'Goro Card Packs.

data.name: Sunwell
data.description: Arthas' corruption of the Sunwell really put a damper on the tourism industry of Quel'Thalas.
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, May 2017.

data.name: Un'goro Mystery
data.description: These long-lost card backs require a machete to shuffle.
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, April 2017.

data.name: Thrill of Victory
data.description: Celebrate the intensity of competition with this, the Hearthstone equivalent of a gigantic foam finger.
data.howToGet: Acquired from attending approved eSports events.

data.name: The Magic of Dalaran
data.description: Deep within the Halls of the Guardian, the most powerful mages of Azeroth forged a magical card back and uttered this arcane incantation: "Pick a card, any card..."
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, June 2017.

data.name: Gone Fishin'
data.description: Buoy oh buoy! Is it reely time for fishing puns? We think knot.
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, November 2017.

data.name: Call of the Void
data.description: A card back unleashed from the realm of infinite darkness. Looks wicked rad under a blacklight.
data.howToGet: Acquired from a special promotion.

data.name: Call of the Light
data.description: A card back called forth from the realm of undying light. Gives hope to all mankind (except your opponent.)
data.howToGet: Acquired from a special promotion.

data.name: Frostmourne
data.description: The undealt shuffle among us, raised from the deck for the cold hand of the Lich King.
data.howToGet: Acquired from the Knights of the Frozen Throne pre-purchase bundle.

data.name: HearthS'mores
data.description: Gather 'round the fire for a toasty treat! (Card back not actually edible.)
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, July 2017.

data.name: Blood Knight
data.description: You provide the sweat and tears, this card back does the rest.
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, August 2017.

data.name: Frost Knight
data.description: A card back so powerful it allows you to walk on water! (If frozen.)
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, September 2017.

data.name: Unholy Knight
data.description: Power corrupts. Absolute power corrupts... AWESOMELY.
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, October 2017.

data.name: For the Hoard!
data.description: In caverns old The kobolds hide Silver and gold, oh! ** You have died **
data.howToGet: Acquired from the Kobolds & Catacombs pre-purchase bundle.

data.name: Candle King
data.description: It is better to light a candle than curse The Darkness. But you can do both.
data.howToGet: Acquired from successfully completing the Kobolds & Catacombs dungeon run with all nine classes.

data.name: Catacomber
data.description: This card back has already been searched for traps.
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, December 2017.

data.name: Frostfire
data.description: No matter the chill in the air, the tavern is always warm and welcoming.
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, January 2018.

data.name: Azeroth is Burning
data.description: War is a terrible thing. Although highly profitable for both red and blue flagmakers.
data.howToGet: Acquired from the Battle for Azeroth Collector's Edition.

data.name: Sparkles
data.description: If you can't beat 'em with strategy, dazzle 'em with magic and glitter!
data.howToGet: Acquired from achieving Rank 20 in Ranked Play, February 2018.

data.name: In a Dark Wood
data.description: The forest was eerily quiet. Aside from the howls. And the screaming.
data.howToGet: Acquired from the Witchwood pre-purchase bundle.

data.name: Year of the Mammoth
data.description: It was a big year. Massive. Sure, things got a little wooly, but that’s irrelephant.
data.howToGet: Acquired from winning five games in Ranked Play, March 2018.

data.name: Monster Hunter
data.description: When fancy weapons and gadgets fail, there’s always tooth and claw.
data.howToGet: Acquired from completing the Monster Hunt with all four heroes and defeating Hagatha.

data.name: Raise the Roof
data.description: The finer Gilnean homes feature "Howling Verandas" with unobstructed lunar views.
data.howToGet: Acquired from winning five games in Ranked Play, April 2018.

data.name: Lunara's Garden
data.description: Sometimes you just gotta frolic through the grass.
data.howToGet: Acquired from winning five games in Ranked Play, May 2018.

data.name: Back in Blue
data.description: The blue dragonflight jealously guards the secrets of magic, such as: Where do all those colored hankies come from?
data.howToGet: Acquired from winning five games in Ranked Play, June 2018.

data.name: Lightforged
data.description: Behold, a grand Army of the Light! Dealing out justice 30 cards at a time.
data.howToGet: Acquired from winning five games in Ranked Play, July 2018.

data.name: Lemonade
data.description: When life gives you lemons,\nmake delicious card backs!
data.howToGet: Acquired from winning five games in Ranked Play, August 2018.

data.name: Mecha-Jaraxxus
data.description: THANK YOU FOR MAKING MY CARD BACK, TRIFLING HUMANS!
data.howToGet: Acquired from the Boomsday Project pre-purchase bundle.

data.name: Boomsday!
data.description: Show your opponent that you’re a mad genius! Or maybe a happy one, depending on the mulligan.
data.howToGet: Acquired from completing all of Dr. Boom’s puzzles.

data.name: VanCardback
data.description: Is this a tribute to the notorious rogue Edwin VanCleef? Nobody knows. Because it wears a mask.
data.howToGet: Acquired from winning five games in Ranked Play, October 2018.

data.name: Dr. Boom's Lab
data.description: Time to experiment!\nWill you make bombs?\nOr will you make... MORE bombs?
data.howToGet: Acquired from winning five games in Ranked Play, September 2018.

data.name: Moonwell
data.description: Night elves use Moonwells to replenish their magical energies. They’re also used in a popular orc prank involving dish soap.
data.howToGet: Acquired from winning five games in Ranked Play, November 2018.

data.name: Blizzard Events 2018
data.description: The stars have aligned into a monumental year for Hearthstone!
data.howToGet: Acquired by participating in Blizzard events during 2018.
